attributes.action: Allow learner drivers to continue to practise with household members
attributes.additional_details: Because young adults do not have much to do during this pandemic and just going for a drive can help cheer us up so much. By changing this, young adults are less likely to become mentally unwell and/ or break the rules.
attributes.background: Change the coronavirus rules for learner drivers, so they are allowed to practise again, so long as they practise with their household/ bubble members.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559063

Under current Government guidance, you can practise driving with members of your household or support bubble. It must be travel for work, education or other essential journeys: https://www.gov.uk/driving-lessons-learning-to-drive/practising-with-family-or-friends
